short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark mode extension to help all users see clearly, allowing advanced options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dark mode extension that enhances dark mode experience for smart users that like this.
Using the advanced configurations you can whitelist a domain, and using the contact button, you can ask for new features and specific customizations.
